entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Go to definition" goes to incorrect function in SourceLinks/disassembled sources #78533
  • [RuntimeAsync] EH miscompile #78529
  • CSharpRemoveUnusedVariableCodeFixProvider crashes if unused variable value is set in an if statement with no braces #78528

Closed

  • Spread operation throws exception in .NET 9 #78506
  • IDE0200: "Lambda expression can be removed" suggests removing `ConfigureAwait(false)`. #77341
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-10608.149 #78531
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10608.57 #78524

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache extension method import info per project ID #78542
    Area-IDE, VSCode
  • Document more steps in our C# release process #78539
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix checked/unchecked pair matching for extension unary operators during consumption #78538
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Add VB ref assembly to semantic search #78537
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key refactorization #78530
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #78527
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cancel running requests when the connection terminates #78525
    Area-IDE, VSCode

Merged

  • Extensions: only count extensions for determining identifier #78523
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Collect data about which code fixes end up making changes that conflict with other code fixes #78540
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Extract helper to make it easier for other features to request copilot analysis #78541
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Source package fixes #78534
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix test helper message to avoid NRE #78532
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Fix information logs getting logged as debug in VSCode #78522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch MethodImplAttributes.Async to 0x2000 #78536
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Shorten log category name #78526
    Area-Infrastructure, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to simple primary constructors for several DI types. #78513
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.14] Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78535
  • Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support consumption of unary extension operators. #78499
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: handle extensions in VB SymbolDisplay #78512
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Don't unnecessarily create a document when only the document state is needed #78463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fix crash in 'introduce variable' on top-level statements #78507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • File based programs IDE support #78488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: pattern-based constructs #78480
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix go to definition for conversions on invalid constructor overloads #78514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Backport copilot text change analysis to 17.14 #78498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Extensions package #78388
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move NullAsynchronousOperationListenerProvider to source package #77187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Hot Reload: Handle document deletes #78516
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update GetFirstRelatedDocumentId to not return documents with the same path within the same project #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Introduce -productBuild and -sourceBuild switches #78519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #78483
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Gracefully handle span mapping failing #78520
    Area-IDE, untriaged
